articles.author: William Wallis
articles.title: The crowning of King Charles: a new start for the British monarchy? - Financial Times
articles.description: Since acceding to the throne the King’s personal approval rating has risen while support for royalty has declined
articles.content:
The crowning of Charles III will be as close as the new King comes to receiving public acclamation in the absence of a ballot.
Saturdays coronation, and the scale of public participation outside Wes… [+5001 chars]

articles.title: Gwyneth Paltrow admits she was 'not prepared' for daughter Apple learning about sex aged 11 - Daily Mail
articles.description: The actress, 50, who shares the 18-year-old as well as son Moses, 17, with her ex-husband Chris Martin, initially welcomed her eldest child's school teaching sex education.
articles.content:
Gwyneth Paltrow has confessed she was 'not prepared' for her daughter Apple learning about sex, aged 11.
